00027 // flag initiated in BDSEventAction
00028 extern G4bool FireLaserCompton;

00079 inline G4bool BDSLaserCompton::IsApplicable(
00080                                             const G4ParticleDefinition& particle)
00081 {
00082   return(  (&particle == G4Electron::Electron())
00083            ||(&particle == G4Positron::Positron()) );
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline G4double BDSLaserCompton::GetMeanFreePath(const G4Track& track,
00087                                                  G4double PreviousStepSize,
00088                                                  G4ForceCondition* ForceCondition)
00089 {
00090   //  G4cout<<" FireLaserCompton="<<FireLaserCompton<<G4endl;
00091   if( track.GetMaterial()==theMaterials->LaserVac &&
00092       //      itsLastMaterial!=theMaterials->LaserVac )
00093 // flag initiated in BDSEventActionxem
00094       FireLaserCompton)
00095     {
00096       //return 0;}
00097       *ForceCondition=Forced;}
00098   // itsLastMaterial=track.GetMaterial();
00099   return DBL_MAX;
00100 }

00102 
00103 inline void BDSLaserCompton::SetLaserDirection(G4ThreeVector aDirection)
00104 {itsLaserDirection=aDirection;}
00105 
00106 inline G4ThreeVector BDSLaserCompton::GetLaserDirection()
00107 {return itsLaserDirection;}
00108 
00109 inline void BDSLaserCompton::SetLaserWavelength(G4double aWavelength)
00110 {itsLaserWavelength=aWavelength;}
00111 
00112 inline G4double BDSLaserCompton::GetLaserWavelength()
00113 {return itsLaserWavelength;}
00114 
00115 inline G4double BDSLaserCompton::SecondaryEnergyThreshold(size_t index)
00116 {
00117   return (*secondaryEnergyCuts)[index];
00118 }
